sqlMap.select: SELECT a.* , b.link_name , b.link_address , b.link_telephone , b.link_mobilephone , b.link_area , b.link_district, b.link_province, b.link_city, f.para_name AS site_name FROM (T_Cm_Branch a LEFT JOIN T_Cm_Link b ON a.link_id = b.id) LEFT JOIN T_Cm_Code f ON (f.para_value = a.site_type AND para_type = 'site_type') where $and{a.id = #id#} $and{name = #name#} $and{code = #code#} $and{industry = #industry#} $and{ownership = #ownership#} $and{abbreviation = #abbreviation#} $and{customer_level = #customer_level#} $and{link_id = #link_id#} $and{site_type = #site_type#} $and{parent_id = #parent_id#} $and{credit_level = #credit_level#} $and{type = #type#} $and{is_headquarters = #is_headquarters#} $and{is_stop = #is_stop#}
sqlMap.update: update T_Cm_Branch set id=#id# ,name=#name# ,code=#code# ,industry=#industry# ,ownership=#ownership# ,abbreviation=#abbreviation# ,customer_level=#customer_level# ,link_id=#link_id# ,site_type=#site_type# ,parent_id=#parent_id# ,credit_level=#credit_level# ,type=#type# ,is_headquarters=#is_headquarters# ,is_stop=#is_stop# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Cm_Branch WHERE id IN(#ids#)
